name: Curve DAO Fee and Bribes Reinvest
description: Accepts {{token}} to earn a continuous share of [Curve Finance](https://curve.fi) fees and Curve DAO voting bribes. Earned [3Crv](https://curve.fi/3pool) (Curve's 3pool LP token) fees and rewards are harvested, swapped for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy. Swap happens either via market-buy or mint, depending which is more capital efficient.
